title: Skinseed for Minecraft
description:
Meet the most versatile Minecraft skin app. 

‚Ä¢ Intuitive skin editor with unique features such as intelligent texture generation
‚Ä¢ 2,000,000+ high quality, fully searchable skins to be used as it is, or as a starting point for your work
‚Ä¢ My Wardrobe feature providing customized skins collection
‚Ä¢ Interactive 3D previews
‚Ä¢ Import from Minecraft game using usernames (skin stealer)
‚Ä¢ One touch, direct export to Minecraft PC and PE

Skinseed is compatible with both PC and Pocket Edition. All features are completely free to use. 

We are always excited to hear from you! If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us using the contact form provided in the app.

Disclaimer: 
This app is not affiliated with, or endorsed by Mojang. "Minecraft" is a trademark of Notch Development AB.

summary: Skin Creator & Skins Editor for Minecraft
developerAddress:
1400 112th Ave SE, Suite 100
Bellevue, WA, 98004
United States
recentChanges:
With Halloween approaching, 128x128 skin import feature is back from the dead :) No seriously, we sincerely apologize for the inconveniences this has caused. With many of us WFH remotely these days, there was an internal communication error that made the feature disappear in the last release.

Thank you so much to all of you who sent us the reports. We apologize for not being able to reply to every reports promptly. Have a happy Halloween!
comments: The app is good. It's a good place to make skins and find bases for your own personal use, but it got rid of one of it's features recently and I can't tell if that's a bug on my part or a purposeful update. I can't open it straight from minecraft to import my skins, so I have to download my skins into my gallery first now. It's a little annoying considering how it used to be. If they fix that though, that'll be a solid 5 stars for me.

After the new android phone update a while ago, there's been a lot of glitches, I tried dealing with it thinking an update to fix it will come but it's not, every time I make a skin and press the tick button it says "saved" at the bottom of the screen but it doesn't come out of the skin and freezes, you need to leave and close the app to use it again, there's lots of other glitches like that, it's really annoying and inconvenient and it would help if it was fixed

This app is so easy. There is a selection of more than 1,000 skins, and they're so easy to import and export onto your Minecraft game. You can even customize your own skins, and search for other peoples' skins. I give this a four-star review because there are a couple bugs but the only one I really know of is that sometimes I cannot find my skin I imported into to Minecraft. It may just be my issue but some of the skins I really like I cannot find in the skins area for Minecraft.

I like this app but the only thing i would want is a bucket/fill tool. The painter gets a little too small for big canvases like the 128 by 128 skins. But other than that, I like how you can put decriptions on your skins and even talk to your followers. One last piece advice is if in the communites, you can label what genre your skin is. All of these comments are maybe just ideas to go off of when trying to make a cool feature in a new update or something like that. Yes this app is very #good

This app is good and I recommend installing it. A lot of skin maker apps before where hard to use, laggy or Minecraft would say it doesn't work. But this one works very well it can lag at times but there aren't many times it does. I really love how you get to make your own, or edit someone else's.

title: Skin Editor 3D for Minecraft
description:
From the most popular Minecraft skin editor on Play Store, 'Skin Editor for Minecraft', we have come back to create a better version with more functionalities to edit skins.

The application supports both 64x32 (old version) and 64x64 (new version) skins.

These are the features of Skin Editor 3D for Minecraft:

1. Create new Minecraft skins
- Using Steve skin
- Browse more than 20,000 skins online
- Copy any online player's skin by name
- Random skin online for you
- Direct import from Minecraft PE
- Browse gallery for skins

2. Edit and impove skins with amazing tools
- Paint brush
- Paint Bucket (Fill tool)
- Color grid selector
- Color gradient selector
- Eye dropper to read color
- Zoom in/out tools
- Rotating tool
- Undo and redo button

3. Adjust visibility of each body part of your Minecraft character. This way it is super easy to paint inside of the body.

4. Export skins in 2 different ways
- Export directly to Minecraft Pocket Edition
- Export to your gallery

You can follow me on Twitter @keeratipong. https://twitter.com/keeratipong

Skin Editor 3D for Minecraft is not developed by Mojang. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB. Please note that we are not affiliated with Mojang AB but we adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at https://www.minecraft.net/terms

comments: This app is amazing! I had so much fun playing this app. Its the best editor for your skin. if you can't find one online that looks like you or, a character you want. you can make it here! The ads aren't annoying, they just come sometimes. If you want a dream character make it here! It's amazing I've never came to an app that is this incredible! Its fun, easy to edit, and more! I love this app. I'm impressed! And I just can't, its so so.... good! Best minecraft skin editor I've even seen.‚ô°~‚ô°

hands down, best skin editor. My only problems is that there isn't a tool to mirror the pen to the other arm/leg. If you could add a tool that enables that, that would be great. Also, the ads aren't too annoying, but it should just be when you save or make a new skin, not after a certain amount of taps on tools. Overall, it's great, but there could be some improvements made.

I mean, this is really a flawless app. It loads fast, the user interface is easy to use yet detailed enough, and I've yet to come across something at all annoying. The one thing I say this could have is an option to see your skin with the arms out or in a walking pose, but this isn't really that necessary and can be done in the MCPE app anyway.

The app itself is nearly great but....it's missing an important feature and that is the "noise mode" where you can add multiple color palettes on a selected body part of a minecraft skin without having to change the color very frequently. Just in case if you don't know developers, it's a feature that is present inside the website of planet minecraft's skin editor. And to wrap it all up, what i'm trying to say is that please, you guys should add that functionality in this application. Thank you.

I gotta say this is one of the best editor for skins so far..but I wish I could edit it. And by that I mean like giving some highlights, or hardcore shading? I always wanted that since I saw some people that have detailed eyes when I saw their minecraft skin. I don't know if this will happen but it's overall a good app to edit your minecraft skin.

title: World of Skins (2020)
description:
25 000 Skins for Minecraft + Skins Editor!


We present our new application from one of the most popular skins developers for Minecraft! Especially for you, we have compiled a collection of unique skins that are not ashamed to show your friends. Absolutely everyone in this app will find for themselves the most beautiful, the most interesting of the skin and can easily install it on your Minecraft. Two categories: for boys and girls, will not make you long to find your favorite skin. Explore it in 3D, and then a finger touch in 2d increase to the smallest pixel!


With built in skins editor you can edit your favorite skins, modify each pixel and save to your collection!


If your phone is turned off, now you do not have to re-flipping all the skins, because the new system, every single skin is stored in the position in which you left it the last time.

To select their most favorite skins here! Push on the heart and the skin will go to your favorite collection of skins! Remove from collection simply need to click on the heart again.


It is also possible to make the skin on the entire screen, to do so, open the menu and click on the item Zoom!


If you want to quickly open the skin recommended by friend you need to open useful function "Open the skin" with it you will quickly go to a needed skin, simply enter its number!


In order to know the number of the current skin you have two options:
1. Go to the landscape orientation.
2. Open the menu and see the number on the selected item.


This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

title: Custom Skin Creator For Minecraft
description:
Create one of a kind custom skins never seen anywhere before. Choose your clothes and easily create your custom skins for minecraft pe and pc.

Best skin editor / creator for Minecraft. 

This is the original ‚ÄùCustom skin creator‚Äù series app.

We have the best clothing for your minecraft skins. Billions of combinations of skins to create. Its NEVERENDING!!! 

Features:

- Lots of premium skins to choose from: Clothing, Mob, Camouflage, Youtubers and much more!
- Save and load skins.
- Change color of your skins.

title: Skin Editor for Minecraft
description:
Skin Editor for Minecraft is a great tool for you to edit and apply Minecraft skins to all platforms.

You don't need BlockLauncher to use Skin Editor (Although you can still use it as an option)

These are Skin Editor for Minecraft features:

1. Create a new Minecraft skin
- Default skin (Steve, Alex, Blank skin)
- Steal player skins from the internet by typing names
- Random online skins
- Browse skins from catalog
- Import skins from your gallery

2. Edit Minecraft skins to fit your needs with these powerful tools
- Pencil
- Bucket (Fill tool)
- Color wheel
- Color palette
- Eye dropper
- Moving tools
- Zoom in/out tools
- Undo button
- 3D Hat feature

3. Rotating your character in 6 directions
- Front view
- Back view
- Left view
- Right view
- Top view
- Bottom view

4. Adjust visibility of your character. Editing Minecraft skins had never been this easy.

5. Export skins in 4 different ways
- Export directly to Minecraft Pocket Edition
- Export to BlockLauncher
- Export to your gallery
- Export to email

Follow me on Twitter @keeratipong. https://twitter.com/keeratipong

Skin Editor for Minecraft is not developed by Mojang. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB. Please note that we are not affiliated with Mojang AB but we adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at https://www.minecraft.net/terms

title: Skin Editor for Minecraft
description:
Create wonderful skins with our application. Here you will find a huge collection of 30,000 skins to choose from.

Application supports:
64x32 (old version)
64x64 (new version)
128x128(need install another app)


Choose the part of the skin that you want to edit. In addition, the editor supports two layers of skins version 1.8 of Minecraft, which allows you to add the details of the relief of your skin.

If you have incorrectly drawn the skin, it is always possible to cancel your actions.

You can select any skin from the gallery and edit or simply change the eyes :)
Do not forget that you can add any skin to your collection if you're tired or edit you need to leave, you just save the skin and continue later.
When editing open the shutter on the right to see the full skin and see what changes have you done!

title: Skin Maker 3D for Minecraft
description:
Create and edit your Minecraft Skin in 3D!!

Skin Maker 3D for Minecraft is a great tool for you to create, edit and apply Minecraft skins to all platforms.

You don't need BlockLauncher to use Skin Maker 3D

These are SkinMaker 3D for Minecraft features:

1. Create a new Minecraft skin
- Default skin (Steve, Alex, Blank skin)
- Steal player skins from the internet by typing names
- Random online skins
- Browse skins from catalog
- Import skins from your gallery

2. Edit Minecraft skins to fit your needs with these powerful tools
- Pencil
- Color wheel
- Color palette
- Eye dropper
- Moving tools
- Zoom in/out tools
- Undo button

3. Rotating your character in 3D!

4. Adjust visibility of your character. Editing Minecraft skins had never been this easy.

5. Export skins in 4 different ways
- Export directly to Minecraft Pocket Edition
- Export to BlockLauncher
- Export to your gallery
- Export to email

Follow me on Twitter @keeratipong. https://twitter.com/keeratipong

Skin Maker 3D for Minecraft is not developed by Mojang. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB. Please note that we are not affiliated with Mojang AB but we adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at https://www.minecraft.net/terms

title: QB9's 3D Skin Editor for Minecraft
description:
Make your Messi version to play in Messicraft!
Create your Gaturro to play in Gatucraft!

Use advanced tools like brush, paint bucket, eraser and color picker to edit your skin and create just the look you've been searching for!
The editor is 3D. You can zoom and rotate the model to paint in a more comfortable way.
This editor has tools to create pixelated textures.
It has an easy to use skin part visibility chooser to let you focus just on the parts you want to edit.
It also supports both skin layers of version 1.8 of Minecraft, allowing you to add details in relief to your skin. 
It has an online catalog of skins where you can search among hundreds of skins that users upload every day. You can share your creations and receive comments and likes from other users.
Finally, we provide a lot of clothes and accessories ready to select and apply on to your skin!

Features:
- Create your skin from Messi, Angelina, Herobrine, Alexandrina, Gaturro or Agatha.
- A online catalog of skins uploaded by users, from where to download new skins already made.
- Intuitive 3D user interface, with zoom in/out tools and rotations.
- A special brush and bucket to paint with pixelated colors.
- Different sizes of brushes to use with the tools.
- Allows you to search skins from other players using their username.
- Option to put the face of Messi, Gaturro or Agatha to any skin.
- Undo and redo tools.
- A large collection of pre-made clothes and accessories to apply directly to your skin.
- Allows to store your creations in our servers to be able to share them with other users of the editor.
- Allow connect to the Mojang account to upload your skins direct to Minecraft PC.
- One touch, direct export to Minecraft PE.
- Export to your gallery too.

QB9's 3D Skin Editor for Minecraft is the official skins editor for the Gaturro and Messi servers.

Join our Messicraft servers! 
PC: play.messicraft.com
PE: play.messicraft.com / port 19132

Join our Gatucraft servers! 
PC: play.gatucraft.com
PE: plaype.gatucraft.com / port 26190

"Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB.
We are not affiliated with Mojang AB but we adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at www.minecraft.net/terms

title: Skin Editor Tool for Minecraft
description:
Skin Toolkit for Minecraft is advanced 3D skin editor for Minecraft that supports the newest skin version.

With easy to use 3D editor and the more precise 2D editor for the pixel-perfect accuracy you can do cooler, more advanced skin edits anytime, anywhere!

We have features not before seen on any other skin editor that will make the creation of your next greatest skin even easier!

You can create, edit, share and even copy skins from even the most famous players of Minecraft!

Import your current skin, or pick one from your phone's gallery, none of this is a problem for our skin editor!

You can also upload your brand new skins to PC version** of Minecraft or even use them with Minecraft Pocket Edition* in just a few clicks!

Use tools like brush, paint bucket, eraser and color picker to optimize your skin crafting and create just the look you've been searching for, and it doesn't end there!

We have easy to use skin part visibility chooser to let you focus just on the parts you want to, now with the new armor edition!

You can also easily use your skins or the ones we provide as a preset, which speeds up the process, lets you reuse skins or even let you make the Frankenstein skin of your choice!

We also provide you with a bunch of skins in a season-specific manner! **

Now you can do all this and more on the go with our ultimate skin editing solution for Minecraft!

Featuring:
- 1.8. Skin Support!
- Sleek and fast 3D editor
- Intuitive user interface
- exporting and playing in MCPE just a couple of clicks *
- Uploading to the PC version in just a few seconds **
- Print your skin from your phone and make it a real-life toy! **
- Pre-made packs of skins for you to enjoy **
- Copy skins from famous players
(*) requires an in-app purchase, the full version of Minecraft and a plugin
(**) requires in-app purchase


"Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB.
We are not affiliated with Mojang AB but we adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at www.minecraft.net/terms

Welcome to the skin 3d studio! Here you can find all needed tools to make your skin for Minecraft. Lets see, how to use our skin creator for Minecraft:


Gallery of mc skins


Our hd Skin Editor for Minecraft features a gallery with hundreds of templates. To make the navigation in our skin creator more convenient, the gallery is divided to different categories, such as games, girl skins for Minecraft, movies, mob skins for Minecraft, custom skins, minecraft skins for boys, etc. Choose the desired template and use skin editor tool for Minecraft to paint skins for Minecraft or download in skin editor for Minecraft pe.


üñåDrawing tools


Choose between 3 different pallets to draw skin for Minecraft with. You can also pick a custom RGB skin color in the Gradient tool of skin creator.


üñçEraser in skin maker is used for turning the pixels of a skin for Minecraft to their original colour. Use this tool to edit skins for Minecraft PE and revert the unwanted changes.


üîºüîΩArrows to fix a skin in the desired position in skin creator for Minecraft PE free and paint skins for Minecraft pe part by part. Choose one of the 6 directions in our skin creator for Minecraft pe: front, back, left, right, top, bottom.


üîÅUndo and redo functions allow you to revert and repeat any recent changes made in the skins creator for Minecraft PE free. Create girl or boy skins for Minecraft pe and choose the best variation in skin maker.


Look at the skins for Minecraft pe free from different angles using the skin editor 3d view tool. It‚Äôs a great way to see the results of you work in skin changer for Minecraft and make some finishing touches. 


üîçBody part visibility function in our skins editor for Minecraft PE free allows you to paint hard-to-reach parts of minecraft skins by temporarily removing the others.


Picker in skin editor helps to identify a needed color for painting skin to not to seek it in the pallets. Just tap on the part of the skin for Minecraft pe and the color will be selected as current.


Bucket is a fill tool to color any part of minecraft skins pe free in the skin editor. So, no needs to draw your skin for Minecraft by pixels.


Change the background


Choose the biome on the background in skin changer app for Minecraft PE to see how your skin for Minecraft pe looks in different environments. Forest, beach, desert ‚Äì our skin editor has them all and even more!


Export skins for Minecraft in the both platforms


Create skins for Minecraft and use them both for PE and standard versions. Our skin maker for Minecraft  saves mc skins in png format so that you can use them for the PC version.


So, let‚Äôs sum up: our skin editor for Minecraft has all the necessary tools and skinseed for Minecraft skins to make skins for Minecraft pe free. And also this skin creator for Minecraft is cool, tiny weight and free for download. Now, stop doubting, set our skin editor 3d and paint skin of your dreams!

title: Skin Stealer for Minecraft
description:
Download your favorite Minecraft skins from PC version to your Minecraft Pocket Edition.

These are the features of Skin Stealer for Minecraft:

1. Randomize your skin from top Minecrafters
- Tap 'Random' button on the top bar
- Get a new famous Minecraft username every time

2. Preview the skin in all 4 sides
- Tap left or right arrows to rotate the character
- Decide if this is the best one for you

3. Apply the skin to Minecraft Pocket Edition
- Type your familiar Minecraft PC usernames in the search bar
- Tap 'Save Skin' button
- Go to Minecraft Pocket Edition and choose the new skin from your Download folder
- Play with your friends with a new custom skin!

4. Apply the skin to Minecraft PC
- Type your familiar Minecraft PC usernames
- Tap 'Apply to PC' button
- Sign in with your PC version account
- Apply the new skin to your account

- Sign in with your PC version account

title: MC Skin Factory for Minecraft
description:
MC Skin Factory for Minecraft is an application in which you can create or download character skins for Minecraft. 

Is it hard to create characters using "MC Skin Factory for Minecraft", an easy-to-create Minecraft skin application? 


The application is meant for kids.

‚ô™ Filled with various kinds of cute and cool characters!
500,000 characters are for free! 
Let's use different characters to match the weather or your feelings. 
From fashionable characters to Fantasy world characters, infinite forms of transformation! MC Skin Factory for Minecraft is the most popular Minecraft mod tool that can be used in Minecraft via Android device.

 In Minecraft MC Skin Factory, you can create new skins and share them and it is easy to download, edit, and share numerous skins made by other people. After editing or creating a skin, simply save as PNG file.

***** Main Feature *****

- You can put colors by clicking 
- You can remove colors by clicking (but it won't turn to white) 
- You can copy the color 
- You can fill the area with the same color 
- You can adjust the brightness of the color 
- It has standard functions as paint tool 
- Preview skins 
- Movement, Magnifying, Minimizing via multi-touch 
- Princess dresses of your dream 
- You can save your character and show it to you friends later 

‚óã Price Information 
‚óã This application is free. You can use the character skins of this application for free.

title: SkinsClub - Skins for CS:GO
description:
Looking for a perfect way to get free skins for cs go or pubg? 
Join our club, earn club points and exchange them for your favorite games items.

SkinsClub is a mobile application that allows their users to collect club points by playing awesome mobile games which are part of offers provided by the third party services.  The range of apps and games to choose from is updated daily, so each day you can find new awesome apps to try and get more and more club points in same time! No gambling or random case opening, you always know what you can get!

If you don't find interesting apps you can always get club points by completing daily bonuses or by our proven referral system. You can get 10% of lifetime referral bonus from each invited friends earnings! 

Whenever you collected enough amount of club points you can easily exchange them to desired skins or another available virtual item. Withdraws process is fast and simple, items are delivered by your public steam trade url.

We offer all type of skins for both games including a variety of csgo weapons,  case keys, stickers pubg clothes, items, skins.

In our skins database, we are focused to list only popular items, the range to choose from starts with cheap but popular skins and ends on high tier items such a hyper beast or stattrak series and more!

Please feel free to contact us at hanzo.apps@gmail.com or by in-app live chat support.

comments: An amazing app! Very simple to use with a lot of features one may need. Unfortunately, there are a few problems I've found. In the texture pack creator it is almost impossible to accurately change any of the long ones (e.g. fire) as they are too small. I would like for a zoom-in feature. Second, when you change textures and save them there's no way to reset to the original texture. Third and final, I would like for an option to mark a texture as complete to know if I've changed it or not.

I really love this app Its a simple way to make your own texture packs. But there's some stuff that are essential but not in the app. For example we need a reset button, because lets say u edit a block and then u don't like it, well u won't be able to undo it after u save it. And two we need a zoom in feature, because some items the pixels are so small we actually can't see a thing. If u can fix this then thank you, I appreciate it.

The app is very fun, entertaining, but also time consuming. I do have three down sides to it. One, from my experience there is no way to reset a texture that you drew on, two, you can't create textures for mobs, and for some reason erasing the bottom of pants and shoes doesn't work when you try to implement it. But over all great app

I love this app because it lets you create a custom world to your liking. There are a few things its missing though. 1.It needs to be able to uptdate because you cant change a few things like the bed or leaves. 2. Add a zoom in option because some of the things are hard to change because of the tiny size. 3. Add a back button so that the block or item can go back to the origonal design even when you save it. Thank you for reading.

great app, Ive used this on my phone to make textures and its great and all, but theres a few problems, its not updsted 1.16 (idk how long it takes or if theyll just update 16 and 17 same time) also there should be a way to download pack to file instead of just minecraft

title: Skin Maker - 3D Skin Creator for CS GO
description:
Create Counter Strike Global Offensive Skins by adding stickers on 3D Weapon Models.

- How to view skins in CS:GO
1. After creating the skin, click on 'Export' button. It will output skin in 'TGA' format in 'DCIM' folder of your Internal Memory.
2. Close the app and locate the skin in 'DCIM/CSGO_SkinMaker/ExportedSkins/...'
3. Copy the TGA File to your PC
4. Download a software named 'VTF Edit' and load the TGA File by clicking on the 'New' icon (which is white colored)
5. Now, click 'Save' in VTF Edit and note the VTF file's location
6. Open CS:GO and write in Console 'workshop_workbench'
7. Now load the VTF File (You can find many Youtube Tutorials on how to load a VTF File in CSGO Workbench)
8. You can also submit the Skin to Valve (Note: the skin needs to be of res 2048x2048 which is a PRO feature)

Features:

- 3D Stickers
a] Custom Stickers: Pick images from Phone Gallery to apply them as stickers on weapon model
b] Default Stickers: Default stickers are available for direct usage
c] Colored Stickers: Picks color from painting section to apply on sticker
d] Undo/Redo available
e] Size of sticker can be controlled
f] Angle of sticker can be controlled

- Color Picker
a] Picks color from entire screen
b] Picked color is directly available in Painting Section

- Geometrical Shapes
a] Use square-like red UI to mask gun part where you don't want color to be applied
b] Reset them back when masking is finished

- Few Major Guns currently available to Paint
a. AK47
b. AWP
c. M4A1
d. M4A4
e. Famas
f. P90
g. USP
h. Desert Eagle

- Languages Support: The app currently supports 8 languages as follows,
1. Japanese
2. English
3. French
4. German
5. Portuguese
6. Russian
7. Spanish

- PRO
a] Make money by selling Skins: Make 2048x2048 and 1024x1024 skins and submit to Valve for inclusion in Case. You can view the skin in CS:GO workbench.

- FREE
a] Make Skins for Fun: Make 512x512 and 256x256 skins and view them in CS:GO workbench.

- System Requirement:
a] Minimum
RAM: 1.5 GB
Android 5.0+
b] Recommended
RAM: 4GB
Android 7.1+

NOTE: 
You can use this app to make skin which can be submitted to valve/steam-community for review. The skin made in this app can be used to showcase a skin idea also. Acceptance of the skins by Valve is not guaranteed by us. It depends upon your design and uniqueness.

title: TroveSkin: Your Skincare Coach
description:
"TroveSkin is your personal skincare coach"

TroveSkin guides you to improve your skin by providing personalised and convenient access to trustworthy skincare. We give you true confidence by coaching you to look and be your best.

Now with TroveSkin, you can track and analyze your skin changes accurately over time!
‚úì Objectively assess your skin changes in response to your lifestyle as well as the skincare products you use.
‚úì Detect and analyse your skin issues (spots, pores, texture, fine lines etc) with cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technology

Start your skincare journey with TroveSkin now!

STEP 1. UNDERSTAND YOUR SKIN, GOALS, LIFESTYLE, AND HABITS 
- Skin analysis: Using cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence technology, TroveSkin helps you understand your skin status by analysing your skin issues such as spots, pores, texture and fine lines. 
- Skin type quiz: Take our skin type quiz in the app to figure out your exact skin type so you can improve on your skincare regime and routine.


STEP 2. LEARN HOW TO IMPROVE YOUR SKIN
-  Discover our content feed: Read personalised articles and skincare tips for your different skin troubles and also catch up on the latest beauty trends!
- Product recommendations: Based on your skin report, TroveSkin gives you a list of recommended skincare products that match your skin type.

STEP 3. GET MOTIVATED! 
- TroveSkin Challenges & TrovePoints, you can get discounts for skincare products on e-commerce sites in your local region.
- Share your results with your friends on social media.

STEP 4. TRACK YOUR SKIN PROGRESS 
- Make it easy to track your skin over time through daily logging and comparing.
- Skin diary: Track the progress of your skin by checking your skin score and skin troubles with TroveSkin regularly. You can even add the skincare products you are using to see if they are working or not! 
- Daily wellbeing log: Track your skincare products, lifestyle, and mood to see how they affect your skin.

‚ñ∂FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
* Webpage: www.troveskin.com 
* Email: hello@troveskin.com  
* Facebook: www.facebook.com/troveskin
* Instagram: www.instagram.com/troveskin
* Twitter: www.twitter.com/troveskinapp

recentChanges:
Hi Trovys!

In this latest app release, you will be able to take pictures using your phone's back camera! This allows you to capture better quality pictures of your facial skin which allows for more accurate skin analysis and comparison of your skin over time.

comments: Nice app but has room to grow. The skin analysis camera doesn't take the picture in the way it says to align your face. It doesn't identify spots, pores, or wrinkles correctly. This needs fixed. Another option would be the ability to upload pictures you already have for the skin analysis. This would be helpful. I've read some tips that pop up like, don't apply toner on your pimple but it doesn't say why. I do like the app design and layout. I like that I can track my skin and my products.

Used this app for almost a year and it doesn't deliver on promises such as correct identification of spots, pores and implementing the reward system with those points they use that are still useless. Needs more product recommendation, routine recommendation as well.

This is honestly the best. I had no idea what to do with my skin care till I came upon this app!! It allows you to take a picture of your skin then it anylises it and tells you the biggest concern that is happening to your skin. You then also get to set a skin care goal and change as you please, overall this is a really great app! Great Job Troveskin!!
Yes, it's excellent they provided good advice on how to take care of the skin as well as they recommend products based on the issue you are having mainly on the face and they do this by quizzes.

I like the concept of this app! As someone whose skin is a constant change, it will be beneficial for me to track my skin and see what were items that worked and made my skin look better vs what didn't. It's fairly easy to gain points, but at this time no rewards are showing for me to redeem, so I'm curious about that. Overall, it's been a good experience.

title: Miiskin - Skin Cancer - Track and Check Moles
description:
SKIN AND MOLE TRACKER
Miiskin is your personal skin and mole checker app - a dermatology tool to help you take care and check for changes to your skin and moles.

Miiskin is the first online app to be dermatologically accredited by the derm / dermatologist accrediting organization, Skin Health Alliance.

MIISKIN HELPS YOU:
- Take photos and track individual moles for changes
- Easily log the tracked mole locations on a body map
- Get a reminder when it‚Äôs time to take a new photo
- Compare baseline and follow-up photos side-by-side
- See informational articles about melanoma and skin cancer

MIISKIN PREMIUM INCLUDES:
- Taking photos of large areas of your skin, like your back
- Extra secure PIN protection
- Examine your photos on bigger screens
- Skin mapping to help you look out for new moles or marks
- Easily transfer your account to a new phone

Miiskin is the most user friendly app for tracking and monitoring changes in your skin and moles. Take control of your concern and start keeping an eye on your skin.

MIISKIN DOES NOT PROVIDE A DIAGNOSIS

The app does not in any way diagnose your skin and moles or evaluate the risk of melanoma. The app is meant to assist you with tracking your moles and skin over time. We do not think that with today‚Äôs technology it is defensible to provide indications of melanoma or skin cancer risk in a mole. Therefore, we opt not to attempt this for now.

If you find a mole that looks concerning you should always consult a certified doctor and let him or her check your skin and moles for skin cancer or malignant melanoma.

THE VISION OF MIISKIN

Miiskin‚Äôs vision is to help its users to be on top of their concern and easily monitor skin and mole changes.

Help us fight melanoma and skin cancer. Tell your friends and family to start checking their skin for changes.

Write to support@miiskin.com for any help with the app.

Wish you the best,

Team Miiskin

comments: I think that this app is best from current available apps, but I very miss possibility to add more skin areas (for example side or some custom area like feet), not only 4 default, I houp you will implement that in near future
Had my phone reset and I can no longer use the basic version, have to pay. Plus I can't find the alleged exported photos other than being told they are on my phone's "hard drive" .
Not free. Crashed my phone. Couldn't find the app easily on phone to uninstall.

Great self monitoring app, highly recommended to keep track of which moles you've had. So when you go to your Dermatology appointment and they ask you if you've noticed a mole before, you'll be able to say "yes!", and they won't need to do a $300 biopsy if you're not sure of the duration of mole existence.

God app, makes you take care of yourself more and pay attention to little things and changes. Too bad you cannot share images. Re. Developer's response below: 1. This is not 1993 and email sharing is not most convenient. 2. Sharing images is not an indication to skip a doctor. You are trying to cover product limitation with false concerns but is actually sounds patronising.

title: SkinsClub - Skins for CS:GO
description:
Looking for a perfect way to get free skins for cs go or pubg? 
Join our club, earn club points and exchange them for your favorite games items.

SkinsClub is a mobile application that allows their users to collect club points by playing awesome mobile games which are part of offers provided by the third party services.  The range of apps and games to choose from is updated daily, so each day you can find new awesome apps to try and get more and more club points in same time! No gambling or random case opening, you always know what you can get!

If you don't find interesting apps you can always get club points by completing daily bonuses or by our proven referral system. You can get 10% of lifetime referral bonus from each invited friends earnings! 

Whenever you collected enough amount of club points you can easily exchange them to desired skins or another available virtual item. Withdraws process is fast and simple, items are delivered by your public steam trade url.

We offer all type of skins for both games including a variety of csgo weapons,  case keys, stickers pubg clothes, items, skins.

In our skins database, we are focused to list only popular items, the range to choose from starts with cheap but popular skins and ends on high tier items such a hyper beast or stattrak series and more!

Please feel free to contact us at hanzo.apps@gmail.com or by in-app live chat support.

title: Jelly Skin For Minecraft
description:
Get the best collection of Jelly Skin For Minecraft, you can easily download and apply Jelly Skin For Minecraft to your character
more than 100+ Jelly Skin For Minecraft is available for free, the best Jelly Skin For Minecraft you ever seen.
This Jelly Skin For Minecraft can use for both Minecraft PE, Minecraft PC, Or MCPE

How to install Jelly Skin For Minecraft. It's very easy to install Jelly Skin For Minecraft. You only need to follow these steps and you should be fine. So, by changing the skins of your character this means that your main character will change it's look. So lets us break to these simple steps :

Go and Check all the skins we brings to you, then choose the one you like and press "install" it's will automatically installed skin in your Minecraft PE, or If you click "save" you will be follow this steps :

1. Go to Minecraft PE, and tap on clothing hanger icon just bellow the player character
2. You will see an empty space next to the Alex and Steve Skins, tap on it
3. Now a new button should appear just above the player model called choose new skins. Just tap on it once, now you will be able to open file manager to sellect the downloaded skins, which is in your download folder.
4. Choose the model which looks perfect for the choosen skin
5. Now, you only need to press "Confirm" skin, after that go back to enter world to make sure it's working
6. Congratulation! Enjoy the Jelly Skin For Minecraft!

NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: Minecraft: Skin Studio
description:
** Officially supported by Mojang! ** Supports PC/Java/Bedrock/Pocket Editions

Now you can create, upload and share Minecraft skins on-the-go! Get creative and design an epic skin for your character. Why stick with plain old Steve when you can choose from almost 1 MILLION community created skins or design your very own personalized skin using our easy to use studio!

- Design your own Minecraft skins, upload to Minecraft or share with the world! 
- Browse Minecraft skins
- Upload to Minecraft.net or download and modify it! (PC/Mac/Pocket Edition version only)
- Almost 1 million skins to choose from! 
- Fully native Android app, designed from the ground up especially for Android.

For more information, see http://www.minecraftskinstudio.com!

==== HOW TO APPLY TO POCKET EDITION ====
This app supports saving to Minecraft Pocket Edition (now known as Bedrock Edition) When your skin has been saved to your Photos, simply open Minecraft and select the appropriate skin!

==== IMPORTANT ==== 
"Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB. 

Skins can only be uploaded to supported Minecraft platforms (PC/Mac/Pocket Edition).

title: Battle Royale Skins | Season 11
description:
If you are a fan of the best Battle Royale game that exists at the moment, this application must be installed on your device, since you will be able to see all the Battle Royale Skins that currently exist within the game, including the new skins of season 10 (X). Updated daily with the new skins that are included in the game.

You can carefully visualize each Skin or suit with our app. We currently have a team of developers who work every day to update the application and be able to have the latest skins published on it.

It is necessary to have an Internet connection to be able to use our application, since in this way the weight of this app will be much lower and you will be able to see all the FREE FBR Skins in real time. The application takes a few hours to update the Skins once these have been placed in the game store or have been added in some other way. Minutes after being added, a PUSH notification is sent to notify you that you can see Skins and all its details.

The Skins of Battle Royale, are the suits that are used to be able to dress our character within the game. These skins only have cosmetic use and do not provide any advantage or benefit when fighting in the game.

title: Skin editor 3D for Roblox
description:
You don't have to spend robux anymore. You don't have to seek free skins for Roblox anymore.
Skin editor 3D for Roblox is unique tool to create/edit/make/modify your own custom Roblox skins from start.
You can create and also edit if you want to edit any skins for Roblox. Turn on your imagination!
Create girls skin, boy skins, pvp skins, minecraft skins, anime skins, heroes skins, mob skins, free skins and a lot's of other skins and more! You don't need robux and free robux! Create skins yourself, for free!

Skin editor 3D for Roblox features:

- Save and load skins
- 3d Model of character so you can see what it will look like in game
- Want to show off your creation? Share a 3d model of what you made with all your friends
- Even easier to use, no art skills required
- Browse skins from catalog
- Import skins from your gallery
- Intuitive user interface

With easy to use 3D editor and the more precise 2D editor for the pixel-perfect accuracy you can do cooler, more advanced skin edits anytime, anywhere! We have features not before seen on any other skin editor that will make the creation of your next greatest skin even easier! You can create, edit, share and even copy skins from even the most famous players of Minecraft! Use tools like brush, paint bucket, eraser and color picker to optimize your skin crafting and create just the look you've been searching for, and it doesn't end there!
We have easy to use skin part visibility chooser to let you focus just on the parts you want to, now with the new armor edition!
You can also easily use your skins or the ones we provide as a preset, which speeds up the process, lets you reuse skins or even let you make the frankenstein skin of your choice!



This is an unofficial application for Roblox. The Roblox Name, Brand and Assets are all property of Roblox Corporation or their respectful owner. This application is not licensed.
All rights reserved. In accordance with https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/203313410-Roblox-Community-Rules

title: All Skin Disorders
description:
There are hundreds of skin conditions that affect humans. The most common skin conditions can have some symptoms that are similar, so it is important to understand the differences between them. A number of skin conditions last a long time. Some may start in childhood and continue into adulthood. In some cases, the condition will not always be present but will flare up at certain times.

Skin disorders vary greatly in symptoms and severity. They can be temporary or permanent, and may be painless or painful. Some have situational causes, while others may be genetic. Some skin conditions are minor, and others can be life-threatening. While most skin disorders are minor, others can indicate a more serious issue.

The information provided in this app is well filtered and revised to accommodate the need to make it as easy to the users as possible, after all you wouldn't want to ditch any textbook only to pick up another in the name of a simple idea or information.

We hope you find the app useful and worth your time, send us your feedback and suggestion on how to improve our app.

Lastly, please take a moment to rate this app if at all you find it beneficial.

title: Skin WWE For Minecraft
description:
Get the best collection of WWE Skin For Minecraft, you can easily download and apply WWE Skin For Minecraft to your character
more than 100+ WWE Skin For Minecraft is available for free, the best WWE Skin For Minecraft you ever seen.
This WWE Skin For Minecraft can use for both Minecraft PE, Minecraft PC, Or MCPE

How to install WWE Skin For Minecraft. It's very easy to install WWE Skin For Minecraft. You only need to follow these steps and you should be fine. So, by changing the skins of your character this means that your main character will change it's look. So lets us break to these simple steps :

Go and Check all the skins we brings to you, then choose the one you like and press "install" it's will automatically installed skin in your Minecraft PE, or If you click "save" you will be follow this steps :

1. Go to Minecraft PE, and tap on clothing hanger icon just bellow the player character
2. You will see an empty space next to the Alex and Steve Skins, tap on it
3. Now a new button should appear just above the player model called choose new skins. Just tap on it once, now you will be able to open file manager to sellect the downloaded skins, which is in your download folder.
4. Choose the model which looks perfect for the choosen skin
5. Now, you only need to press "Confirm" skin, after that go back to enter world to make sure it's working
6. Congratulation! Enjoy the WWE Skin For Minecraft!

NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.

title: FBR Maker - Skin creator Battle Royale
description:
Discover the easiest and simple way to create your own Battle Royale Skins for FREE.

Combine heads, bodies and backgrounds to generate the most original Skins you can imagine.

A simple and elegant interface for you to spend hours creating your own characters for the battlefield.

Select the head, then the body and to finish choose one of the backgrounds that we make available to you.


Discover our extensive content in continuous expansion.

In our initial version you will find:

- 39 full Skins to combine with each other.
- 22 battle backgrounds to create a perfect setting.
- More than 30000 possible combinations so you don't stop the fun for a second.
- Perfect fit between heads and bodies for realistic original Skins.
- Possibility to save your creations in the memory of your mobile with a single touch.
- Share your most extravagant Skins as you want. By mail, Bluetooth or on your social networks with a single button.


Advantages of FBR Maker

All combinable parts of the Skins have been meticulously created to obtain an almost perfect fusion between them.
Thoroughly adjusting the head and body of the initial 39 skins so that any combination you can think of is perfect.

A single touch of a button will allow you to save the created character for later use in your social networks as an avatar or profile picture. Or even to stay with your friends telling them that you've got a Skin they won't believe.

We also offer you the possibility to share directly from our app using any third party application that allows the sending of images.

We have strived to create an intuitive interface to make it quick and easy to use our Skins generator.

At the top you will have 5 options:

- Head: to select any of the 39 available heads. When you tap on it you will see a list with the images at the bottom of the screen. Touching each head you can immediately see the result in the central image of the creator FBR Maker.

- Body: this allows you to change the body of the characters. 39 options in the initial version that we will expand in future updates.

- Scene: allows you to alternate the background of your creations to give it a more personal touch. Find the scene that best suits your creation and get a real work of art that will be the envy of all your friends.

- Save: Allows you to save your FBR Maker creation in your mobile photo gallery with a single touch.

- Share: Share your madness quickly using any social network, mail app or messaging, Bluetooth ...


In short, we've created the best and most fun Battle Royale Skins generator for you to have a great time with our FBR Maker editor.

Enjoy like a dwarf and share your creations with your friends, family or the whole world. Will you be able to be the most original?



Disclaimer

This app complies with Epic Games' Fortnite fan policy which can be found at the following URL: https://www.epicgames.com/site/es-ES/fan-art-policy

Portions of the materials used are trademarks and/or copyrighted works of Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved by Epic. This material is not official and is not endorsed by Epic.

title: Skin WWE For Minecraft
description:
Get the best collection of WWE Skin For Minecraft, you can easily download and apply WWE Skin For Minecraft to your character
more than 100+ WWE Skin For Minecraft is available for free, the best WWE Skin For Minecraft you ever seen.
This WWE Skin For Minecraft can use for both Minecraft PE, Minecraft PC, Or MCPE

How to install WWE Skin For Minecraft. It's very easy to install WWE Skin For Minecraft. You only need to follow these steps and you should be fine. So, by changing the skins of your character this means that your main character will change it's look. So lets us break to these simple steps :

Go and Check all the skins we brings to you, then choose the one you like and press "install" it's will automatically installed skin in your Minecraft PE, or If you click "save" you will be follow this steps :

1. Go to Minecraft PE, and tap on clothing hanger icon just bellow the player character
2. You will see an empty space next to the Alex and Steve Skins, tap on it
3. Now a new button should appear just above the player model called choose new skins. Just tap on it once, now you will be able to open file manager to sellect the downloaded skins, which is in your download folder.
4. Choose the model which looks perfect for the choosen skin
5. Now, you only need to press "Confirm" skin, after that go back to enter world to make sure it's working
6. Congratulation! Enjoy the WWE Skin For Minecraft!

title: FBR Maker - Skin creator Battle Royale
description:
Discover the easiest and simple way to create your own Battle Royale Skins for FREE.

Combine heads, bodies and backgrounds to generate the most original Skins you can imagine.

A simple and elegant interface for you to spend hours creating your own characters for the battlefield.

Select the head, then the body and to finish choose one of the backgrounds that we make available to you.


Discover our extensive content in continuous expansion.

In our initial version you will find:

- 39 full Skins to combine with each other.
- 22 battle backgrounds to create a perfect setting.
- More than 30000 possible combinations so you don't stop the fun for a second.
- Perfect fit between heads and bodies for realistic original Skins.
- Possibility to save your creations in the memory of your mobile with a single touch.
- Share your most extravagant Skins as you want. By mail, Bluetooth or on your social networks with a single button.


Advantages of FBR Maker

All combinable parts of the Skins have been meticulously created to obtain an almost perfect fusion between them.
Thoroughly adjusting the head and body of the initial 39 skins so that any combination you can think of is perfect.

A single touch of a button will allow you to save the created character for later use in your social networks as an avatar or profile picture. Or even to stay with your friends telling them that you've got a Skin they won't believe.

We also offer you the possibility to share directly from our app using any third party application that allows the sending of images.

We have strived to create an intuitive interface to make it quick and easy to use our Skins generator.

At the top you will have 5 options:

- Head: to select any of the 39 available heads. When you tap on it you will see a list with the images at the bottom of the screen. Touching each head you can immediately see the result in the central image of the creator FBR Maker.

- Body: this allows you to change the body of the characters. 39 options in the initial version that we will expand in future updates.

- Scene: allows you to alternate the background of your creations to give it a more personal touch. Find the scene that best suits your creation and get a real work of art that will be the envy of all your friends.

- Save: Allows you to save your FBR Maker creation in your mobile photo gallery with a single touch.

- Share: Share your madness quickly using any social network, mail app or messaging, Bluetooth ...


In short, we've created the best and most fun Battle Royale Skins generator for you to have a great time with our FBR Maker editor.

Enjoy like a dwarf and share your creations with your friends, family or the whole world. Will you be able to be the most original?



Disclaimer

This app complies with Epic Games' Fortnite fan policy which can be found at the following URL: https://www.epicgames.com/site/es-ES/fan-art-policy

Portions of the materials used are trademarks and/or copyrighted works of Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved by Epic. This material is not official and is not endorsed by Epic.

title: Skins FX FF 4k wallpapers maker
description:
With the free Skins FX app you can design your own wallpapers for your mobile in FullHD by combining skins in different scenarios or applying our exclusive special effects.

New backgrounds and characters will often be added to expand the catalog of wallpapers and you have more variety to customize your mobile.

With our app you can select your favourite FF character and change the setting to create your own wallpaper. You can also apply our 11 exclusive filters to get a stunning image that you can use as background on the screen of your mobile, share in social networks or messaging apps, or save on the reel of your mobile.

Enter our app and discover the best FF wallpapers. Discover the features of our app:

- Weekly updates with new FF backgrounds and characters.
- 11 exclusive versions of each skin with incredible and exclusive special effects.
- Immersive mode with which to hide the buttons of the app so you can see the backgrounds in full screen with all the details.
- 3 buttons to select the background (FF map scenario), the skin protagonist of the wallpaper, or the FX (access to 11 exclusive backgrounds created specifically for our app)
- Option to save your creations or backgrounds already created with special effects in your mobile gallery.
- Possibility to share Skins FX funds directly from the app in your social networks or messaging apps.
- Simple and fast handling to make it easy for you to manage our app.
- All images have been optimized to occupy as little as possible without losing quality. In this way we have improved the loading speed of the app and reduced the consumption of mobile data.


To use Skins FX you just have to touch the button on the left corresponding to the element you want to change from the wallpaper (Background or stage, skins or character, FX to see the special effects backgrounds).
Once you have selected one of the buttons you will see it illuminate with a blue ring around it.
Then tap Previous or Next to view all available content.
At the top you have the buttons to save the wallpaper in your mobile gallery or to share it with your friends in any app that allows it (messaging, social networks ...)
In the lower left half you will see the icon of an eye. Use it to activate the immersive mode and hide all the buttons. Once activated you can see the available items by touching the left or right half of the screen.
Touch the eye icon again to show the buttons again and you can change the item to be modified.
Remember that you will need an internet connection to use our app. All images are hosted on our server. We recommend the use of WIFI to avoid excessive expenses in your data rate.


DISCLAIMER:

This application is made by Free Fire fans, and is not official. The content of this application is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored or specifically approved by any of the company's games. All copyrights and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Images from this application are collected throughout the site and are licensed under the Creative Commons CC-BY license;

This application is primarily for entertainment and for all Free Fire fans to enjoy Wallpapers, if we are in violation of copyright, please let us know and it will be removed as soon as possible.

These images have been collected from different public sources. We do not own any photos and do not collect any additional data. This is not an official Free Fire wallpaper application.

- Option to save your creations or backgrounds already created with special effects in your mobile gallery.
- Possibility to share Skins FX funds directly from the app in your social networks or messaging apps.
- Simple and fast handling to make it easy for you to manage our app.
- All images have been optimized to occupy as little as possible without losing quality. In this way we have improved the loading speed of the app and reduced the consumption of mobile data.


To use Skins FX you just have to touch the button on the left corresponding to the element you want to change from the wallpaper (Background or stage, skins or character, FX to see the special effects backgrounds).
Once you have selected one of the buttons you will see it illuminate with a blue ring around it.
Then tap Previous or Next to view all available content.
At the top you have the buttons to save the wallpaper in your mobile gallery or to share it with your friends in any app that allows it (messaging, social networks ...)
In the lower left half you will see the icon of an eye. Use it to activate the immersive mode and hide all the buttons. Once activated you can see the available items by touching the left or right half of the screen.
Touch the eye icon again to show the buttons again and you can change the item to be modified.
Remember that you will need an internet connection to use our app. All images are hosted on our server. We recommend the use of WIFI to avoid excessive expenses in your data rate.


DISCLAIMER:

This application is made by Free Fire fans, and is not official. The content of this application is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored or specifically approved by any of the company's games. All copyrights and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Images from this application are collected throughout the site and are licensed under the Creative Commons CC-BY license;

This application is primarily for entertainment and for all Free Fire fans to enjoy Wallpapers, if we are in violation of copyright, please let us know and it will be removed as soon as possible.

These images have been collected from different public sources. We do not own any photos and do not collect any additional data. This is not an official Free Fire wallpaper application.

title: Skin Viewer 3D
description:
Skin Viewer 3D


A Material-designed application to load, view and apply your Minecraft skin or Minebuilder skin!


Functions:
You can view the skin by using the 'View Skin' button.

You can select a skin using the 'Select Skin' button:
- from Minebuilder Online Skin Database (loginname required)
- from Minecraft Online Skin Database (playername required)
- from URL (URL required)
- from file (some kind of file manager required)

You can select a background from using the 'Select Background' button:
- from URL (URL required)
- from file (some kind of file manager required)

You can use your skin using the 'Use Skin' button:
- to Download the skin to storage
- to apply the skin to Minebuilder singleplayer.
- to apply the skin to Minebuilder multiplayer.
- to apply the skin to Minecraft PC multiplayer.
- to apply the skin to Minecraft Pocket Edition singleplayer/multiplayer.

Watch an app preview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hvKMgMEy2k8


Controls:
On the main screen:
- Press a button and you will see its functions
- There is a menu too

In SkinViewer mode:
- Tap (holding tap): Skin stops rotating
- Left and right swipe: Rotate skin in swipe-direction (and keep rotating in that direction when the finger is removed from the screen)
- Swipe, when an arm or leg is touched: rotating body part
- Double tap to show menu (for extra features)
-- Menu:
--- Show snow
--- Show rain
--- Clear weather
--- Slanted arms/legs
--- Zoom
--- Show/hide parts
--- Save screenshot
--- Enable/Disable auto-rotation
--- Close menu

Live Wallpaper:
- A 3D live wallpaper (skin viewer)!
- Double tap to show/clear snow or rain
- Swipe to change rotation direction
- For custom skins and backgrounds:
-- skin: place a skin.png file in /*storage*/SkinViewer
-- background: place a background.png file in /*storage*/SkinViewer
(*storage* is usually the SD-card)
-- or use the in-app Navigation Drawer to change both skin and background!


Supports:
Minecraft (normal skin version and 1.8 skin version) and Minebuilder skins are both supported!
Minebuilder: https://www.space-walrus.com/games/Minebuilder/get/android
Minecraft: https://minecraft.net/pocket


Permissions used:
Internet & Wifi - Advertentions and obtaining skins and/or backgrounds
Read & Write - Loading, saving and applying skins and/or backgrounds


Libraries used:
JPCT-AE: http://www.jpct.net/
ZipI/O: Kellinwood
ZipSigner: Kellinwood
ZipLogger (x2): Kellinwood


Notes:
Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB. I am not affiliated with Mojang AB but I adhere to the terms set out by Mojang AB at
https://www.minecraft.net/terms
Minebuilder is a trademark of Space Walrus. I am not affiliated with Space Walrus but I adhere to the terms set out by Space Walrus at
https://www.space-walrus.com/terms

comments: Totally useless skin. I wasted my money. I installed this skin on Poweramp version v3-build-874-arm64-play. None of the settings for this skin work for me. 1) Turning on / off vintage screen frame does nothing 2) Changing background textures does nothing 3) Changing accent color does nothing How do I get my money back?

Dials and sliders have a nice, polished, hi-fi look, but I really dislike the cassette style playback buttons, I prefer the round, metallic buttons like in the retro metallic skin. Asked the dev if they would add something, has yet to respond in almost 2 months. I want a refund.

A lot, and I mean a lot of work has clearly gone into this skin. Yes, when Poweramp changes most skins will require work, so don't be angry if you have to wait a bit longer for this skin to be updated accordingly. My only gripe but it's a big one is that if you want to use Poweramp full screen (ie status bar hidden) you have a hideous white bar where the status bar was. Perfect skin though.

thank you for fixing this. really appreciate, without it i could nolonger us poweramp with its ugly new ui, this is simple, looks great though not exactly dark solid black as it used to appear. Could look alittle more darker/solid black as it used to on the older version but still alot better than the standard ui. appreciate!

As a long time user of Poweramp, I am very hard to please when it comes to third party skins. A great audio player demands equally great skins and many just don't cut it. This is a tasteful, high quality skin that looks fantastic! Definitely worth the price of admission and my personal favorite!

title: Skin Types
description:
Skin type plays a crucial role in determining effective skin care habits and acne treatment. Discover your skin type and learn the best acne treatment options.

Your skin type is usually due to genetic predisposition, but there are habits that can exacerbate a skin condition. Pinpointing your skin type and understanding the ways to properly treat it can help you achieve clear, healthy-looking skin for a lifetime. Each skin type has a specific set of characteristics and symptoms, and thus requires special attention. Read on to find out about your personal skin type and determine how to best treat it.

Find extensive information on how to determine and manage your skin type.

- What is skin type?
- What Influences Skin Type?
- Will My Skin Type Change?
- Will I Ever Have ‚ÄúNormal‚Äù Skin?
- Combination Skin Is the Most Confusing Skin Type.
- Unseen Skin Types Below the Surface.
- Skin-Care Products Can Influence Skin Type and Not in a Good Way!
- Everyone Has Sensitive Skin.
- Mature Skin Folly: Skin Type Has Nothing to 
Do with Your Age.
- Does Skin Color or Ethnicity Affect Skin Care?
- Determining Your Skin Type.

title: Girl Skins
description:
You get to meet a very nice girl who is happy today because she just got new skins for her Minecraft collection. And this girl of course will be you!
Why don't you try them on now? Do your skin and create your own style!
Girl skins for Minecraft has a catalogue of skins for you to choose from: girls skins, baby skins, boys skins, 3d skins, babies skins, noob skins, monsters skins, skeleton skins, wtf skins, enderman skins, shaders, mc skins name, minecraft zombie skins, skin template, herobrine skins, steve skins, popular skins... and a lot of new characters from games, movies and cartoons!
This skin pack is compatible all mods, addons, maps, updates and multiplayer for minecraft.
Skins can be used on all platforms: Xbox, PlayStation, Android, Wii and others.
Choose girl skins, define the attack and destroy your enemies with a good strategy. Download cool Minecraft skins and enjoy!

Features of the app:
‚úì All skins for free;

‚úì More than 10000 best skins;

Download best Minecraft skins and new outfits!

Have fun!
